root.name: fetch
tip: Fetches a tool to the local machine

next.name: node
tip: Fetch the LTS version of Node
You can also specify a specific version, such as node@20

next.name: npm
tip: Fetch the latest version of npm
You can also specify a specific version, such as npm@10

next.name: pnpm
tip: Fetch the latest version of pnpm
You can also specify a specific version, such as pnpm@10

next.name: yarn
tip: Fetch the latest version of yarn
You can also specify a specific version, such as yarn@1

next.name: yarn@1
tip: Fetch the v1 version of yarn

root.name: pin
tip: Pin your project's runtime or package manager
E: pin node@lts

root.name: list
tip: Display the current toolchain

next.name: all
tip: List all installed tools(include different version)

options.name: -c
tip: U: -c, --current
Show the currently-active tool(s)

options.name: -d
tip: U: -d, --default
Show your default tool(s)

options.name: --format
tip: U: --format <format>
Specify the output format [possible values: human, plain]

root.name: install
tip: U: install <node|npm|yarn|...>
Install a tool in your toolchain
E: install node@lts
install yarn@1

next.name: node
tip: Install the LTS version of Node
You can also specify a specific version, such as node@20

next.name: npm
tip: Install the latest version of npm
You can also specify a specific version, such as npm@10

next.name: pnpm
tip: Install the latest version of pnpm
You can also specify a specific version, such as pnpm@10

next.name: yarn
tip: Install the latest version of yarn
You can also specify a specific version, such as yarn@1

next.name: yarn@1
tip: Install the v1 version of yarn

next.name: typescript
tip: Install the latest version of TypeScript

root.name: uninstall
tip: U: uninstall <node|npm|yarn|...>
Uninstall a tool in your toolchain
E: uninstall node@lts

root.name: which
tip: U: which <node|npm|yarn|...>
Locate the actual binary that will be called by Volta

root.name: run
tip: Run a command with custom node/npm/pnpm/yarn versions

options.name: --node
tip: U: --node <version> <command>
Set the custom Node version

options.name: --npm
tip: U: --npm <version> <command>
Set the custom Npm version

options.name: --yarn
tip: U: --yarn <version> <command>
Set the custom Yarn version

options.name: --env
tip: U: --env <NAME=value>
Set an environment variable (can be used multiple times)

options.name: --no-yarn
tip: Disable Yarn

options.name: --bundled-npm
tip: Force npm to be the version bundled with Node

root.name: setup
tip: Enable Volta for the current user / shell

root.name: help
tip: U: help <command>
Prints this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

root.name: completions
tip: Generate Volta completions

options.name: -v
tip: U: -v, --version
Print the current version of Volta

common_options.name: -h
tip: U: -h, --help
Show help

common_options.name: --verbose
tip: Enables verbose diagnostics

common_options.name: --very-verbose
tip: Enables trace-level diagnostics

common_options.name: --quiet
tip: Prevents unnecessary output
